snippet.title: Ace Attorney: Truth and Consequences
snippet.description:
Ace Attorney: Truth and Consequences is coming on April 15th, 2023! 

Ace Attorney: Truth and Consequences is a new game coming from Sarcastic Pasta Games. It is being developed alongside Glitch in the System. Step into the world of Ace Attorney for 5 brand new cases with the characters you've gotten to know and love written by KatieMarie999, the co-writer and co-director for The BOSS, The BOSS is Nothing, and Glitch in the System.

Set just a few weeks after Spirit of Justice, Phoenix Wright and his friends take on five brand new cases! Meanwhile, a notorious serial killer has come out of hiding to target Miles Edgeworth. Can Phoenix figure out who this killer is before they come after Edgeworth himself? And does the fact that a prosecutor from his past has returned have anything to do with this current dilemma?

Case 1: The Turnabout Method
Case 2: Turnabout Ladies Night
Case 3: The Twin Turnabout (Athena)
Case 4: The Shattered Turnabout
Case 5: Turnabout Parallel Worlds
Case 6: Turnabout of the Past

Featuring one full case for both Athena Cykes and Apollo Justice as well as familiar faces and ties to previous games, Truth and Consequences will be an unforgettable experience. Turnabout Ladies Night is almost completely finished, while Turnabout Revitalization is currently in development.

The brainchild of KatieMarie999 with help from CelestialSushi and some new faces, Truth and Consequences is certain to surprise, entertain... and maybe pull at your heartstrings.

Follow its progress here: https://gamejolt.com/games/truth-and-consequences/783854
